source.9eec9239:
## run this code
## to create a dir ~/.kaggle 
## and copy kaggle.json to this dir
## and change the mod

!mkdir ~/.kaggle
!cp kaggle.json ~/.kaggle/kaggle.json
!chmod 600 ~/.kaggle/kaggle.json
source.a47a1cc2:
'''
{
  "title": "INSERT_TITLE_HERE",
  "id": "YOURUSERNAME/INSERT_TITLE_HERE",
  "licenses": [
    {
      "name": "CC0-1.0"
    }
  ]
}
'''

## Running this code will show the info above.
## go to the folder, open the json file with editor
## change INSERT_TITLE_HERE with the name you like
## Cannot leave it default
## Then CTRL+S
## After, rerun this code to make sure changes are saved

!cat FILENAME/dataset-metadata.json
source.3069ef82:
## start upload and make your Kaggle Dataset

!kaggle datasets create -p FILENAME/
source.086cb937:
### To download *kaggle.json,*
### go to Your Profile -> Account -> Create New API Token
source.495869e1: # This Notebook shows how to upload your data from GCP JupyterLab to Kaggle Dataset
source.779c3005: ## *FILENAME* is the folder you want to upload to your Kaggle Dataset
